Package ie.gmit.sw

Interface Handleator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceHandler
public interface Handleator
Interface which states what a Handleator should do. This interface follows the facade design pattern as it is composed of other interfaces which allows us to handle all functionality from the one place. As this application is quite complicated with the amount of classes that all abide by the SRP. I felt it would be beneficial to use an interface like this to connect everything together.

  • Method Details

    • readDocument

      void readDocument​(String filePath)
      Reads document and adds it to a BufferedReader using filePath.
      Parameters:
      filePath - - String containing the path to file

    • parseDocument

      void parseDocument​(String title, BufferedReader br) throws IOException
      Delegates work to the Parserator which parses the file using the BufferedReader.
      Parameters:
      title - - Used to add title to document
      br - - BufferedReader that contains file contents
      Throws:
      IOException - - File handling

    • processDocument

      void processDocument​(HashingMethod hashingMethod)
      Responsible for delegating work to the Shingler and Hasher to shingle and hash the document.
      Parameters:
      hashingMethod - - Enum which states the hashing method to use

    • displayDocument

      List<String> displayDocument()
      Responsible for getting the set of words that has been parsed.
      Returns:
      list of words

    • addDocument

      void addDocument()
      Delegates work to Database to add a document.

    • compareSimilarity

      List<PlagiarismResult> compareSimilarity()
      Delegates work to the SimilarityCalculator where the similarity of the document compared to all other documents is calculated.
      Returns:
      list of PlagiarismResults

    • checkForFullPlagiarism

      boolean checkForFullPlagiarism()
      Checks if the document fully plagiarises any other document in the database. If it does we do not want to store it.
      Returns:
      boolean depending on if there is full plagiarism or not

    • process

      List<PlagiarismResult> process​(String fileName, HashingMethod hashingMethod) throws IOException
      Responsible for calling all the other methods. In controller.java, the client can simply call the Process method instead of having to call each method individually. This helps the Handleator follow the facade pattern.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - String containing the path to file
      hashingMethod - - Enum which states the hashing method to use
      Returns:
      list of PlagiarismResults
      Throws:
      IOException - - File handling
